sentences.sContent: the changes currently proposed by the local planning authorities
sentences.sCn: 目前由地方规划局提议的改革

sentences.sContent: The resolution was proposed by the chairman of the International Committee.
sentences.sCn: 那项决议是由国际委员会主席提出的。

sentences.sContent: Shaun proposed to me only six months after we met.
sentences.sCn: 我们相识仅六个月，肖恩就向我求婚了。

phrases.pCn: 推荐某人(参加某组织)；提名某人(任某职)

remMethod.val: pro(提前)+pos(放)+e→把想法提前放出来讨论→提议， 建议

words.tran: 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者
提议；计划（propose的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to suggest something as a plan or course of action
